actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to authorize adaptive equipment for a second automobile or conveyance owned by veterans eligible for assistance under chapter 39 of such title.

summary.text: Increases to two the number of automobiles for which adaptive equipment may be authorized for disabled veterans eligible to receive assistance from the Veterans' Administration in procuring one.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to authorize adaptive equipment for a second automobile or conveyance owned by veterans eligible for assistance under chapter 39 of such title.
